# LexiClash - Multiplayer Word Game

> LexiClash is a fast-paced, real-time multiplayer word game where players compete to find words on a letter grid.

## About

LexiClash is a free online word game inspired by Boggle, Alias, and Kahoot. Players join rooms, find words by connecting adjacent letters on a grid, and compete for the highest score. The longer the word, the more points earned.

## Key Features

- Real-time multiplayer gameplay via WebSocket
- Support for multiple languages: English, Hebrew, Swedish, Japanese
- No download or installation required
- Perfect for parties, team building, and family activities
- Mobile-friendly responsive design
- QR code and link sharing for easy room invitations

## How It Works

1. A host creates a room and shares the 4-digit code
2. Players join using the code or invitation link
3. When the game starts, a letter grid appears
4. Players find words by connecting adjacent letters (horizontal, vertical, diagonal)
5. Each letter can only be used once per word
6. Longer words earn more points (word length - 1 = points)
7. Duplicate words found by multiple players don't count

## Languages

- English (en): /en
- Hebrew (he): / (default)

## Technical Stack

- Next.js (React framework)
- WebSocket for real-time communication
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- Framer Motion for animations
